# Apuesta Esports - LLM-Readable Site Description
# https://www.apuestaesports.com
# Last updated: 2026-02-24

## Site Purpose
Apuesta Esports is the world's most comprehensive esports reference database, providing detailed information about competitive gaming including teams, players, countries, tournaments, and betting guides.

## Main Sections

### Games (/games/)
Comprehensive coverage of major esports titles:
- Counter-Strike 2 (CS2) - Premier tactical FPS, $150M+ prize pool
- Dota 2 - MOBA with The International, $312M+ prize pool
- League of Legends - World's most-watched esport, $100M+ prize pool
- Valorant - Riot's tactical shooter, VCT circuit
- Fortnite - Battle royale, World Cup
- Rainbow Six Siege - Tactical FPS, Six Invitational
- Rocket League - Vehicular soccer, RLCS
- Call of Duty - FPS, CDL Championship
- Overwatch 2 - Hero shooter, Overwatch League
- StarCraft II - RTS, Global Finals

### Teams (/teams/)
Database of 500+ esports organizations ranked by earnings:
- Team profiles with history, rosters, achievements
- Earnings breakdowns by game
- Tournament participation records

### Players (/players/)
Profiles of 5,000+ professional players:
- Career earnings and rankings
- Team history and transfers
- Country of origin
- Game specialization

### Countries (/countries/)
Esports statistics by nation:
- Total prize money earned
- Number of professional players
- Primary competitive games
- Notable players and teams
- Esports infrastructure analysis

### Betting (/betting/)
Esports betting educational content:
- Beginner's guide to esports betting
- Game-specific betting strategies
- Market explanations (match winner, handicaps, totals)
- Bankroll management

### Live Odds (/live/)
Real-time esports betting odds dashboard with interactive map showing matches worldwide.

## Data Sources
- Esports Earnings (esportsearnings.com) for prize money data
- Liquipedia for tournament and roster information
- Official game publishers for competitive data
